posts.post_content: If people want to know what Maro means when he talks about "parasitic design" he should just link them to this card.

posts.post_content:
Second lowest rated modern counterspell? Really? Can we at least get this above [Vex](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vex)? [Rend Spirit](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rend Spirit) is rated 0.8 higher than this as I write this. Vex, [Spell Snip](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spell Snip), [Mindstatic](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mindstatic), [Lay Bare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lay Bare) all beat this as well. This spell may be way too niche, but it is good at its niche! Those cards are each just awful!  
  
Yeah, this isn't really going to see play, but consider the following. 1.) Limited. Kamigawa has a lot of spirits and arcane spells. If you were playing limited/sealed blue, you could do worse than this. Its Kamigawa, you could do way worse. 2.) Cards like this are necessary. They always put out a hate card or two for each mechanic they make, just in case R&D missed something. at ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Blue](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=U&type=symbol), this card is both cheaper and less color intensive than cancel. If spiritcraft has somehow been a thing, this would have been a good sideboard card. 3.) Arcane may be useless, but spirit isn't. No, its not... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
